intro: From information architecture, to researching UI elements, to maniacally curating interactions.
Plus, my first love, program optimization.
portfolio: I have contributed in multiple projects of amazing companies such as: FaceBook, Amazon, NodeJs, Nautech System, Axios.

intro: I'm <ImageVenice>Anurag</ImageVenice>, an experienced <ImageVenice>Full Stack Engineer</ImageVenice> immersed in software and web development. My passion lies in crafting open-source applications, solutions and tools, while collaborating with different developers around the world.

I'm currently in the  <ImageVenice>Agartala </ImageVenice>, working remotely in projects involving TypeScript, JavasScript, Node.js, React, and Go. With over  <ImageVenice>4 </ImageVenice> years of experience, I've worked closely with companies locally and remotely with different teams worldwide.
method:
Creating a successful product is not just about having beautiful aesthetics and impressive animations.
The effectiveness and usability of a project depends on the synergies formed between designer and developer.

I promote continuous, attitudinal
and methodical improvement
for myself and others
If international recognition comes on top of that, it is a greater satisfaction.
